revision.text:
'''Bavarian''' is the adjective form of the German state of [[Bavaria]], and refers to people of ancestry from Bavaria.
'''Bavarian''' may also refer to: * [[Bavarii]], a Germanic tribe * [[Bavarians]], a nation and ethnographic group of Germans * [[Bavarian, Iran]], a village in Fars Province * [[Bavarian language]], a group of closely related Upper German dialects
== See also == * {{lookfrom|Bavarian}} * [[Bavaria (disambiguation)]]
{{disambiguation}} [[Category:Language and nationality disambiguation pages]]
